description: freetype: A+C: Jeff R. Allen (individual CLA)

messages.text:
On 14 June 2012 10:45, Russ Cox <rsc@google.com> wrote:
> Only contributors needs the gmail address.

$GOROOT/AUTHORS has e-mail addresses for individual contributors.

Anyway, LGTY?

LGTM if you remove the gmail address from AUTHORS.

Leave the first email address - the point is that you don't need the
secondary one there. The second address is only for looking up people
by codereview user name, and that only looks in CONTRIBUTORS, not in
AUTHORS. The lines in AUTHORS should have at most one email address.

Russ

Hello adg@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/freetype-go
Only contributors needs the gmail address.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/freetype-go/source/detail?r=3eb9f09ecbb1 ***

freetype: A+C: Jeff R. Allen (individual CLA)

R=adg, rsc
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6306078

subject: code review 6306078: freetype: A+C: Jeff R. Allen (individual CLA)
